donuts.name: Homemade Donuts
steps: Dissolve the yeast in warm water. Melt the shortening with the milk and let it cool.
Mix the yeast with the milk and melted shortening. Add sugar, salt, nutmeg, beaten eggs, and 2 cups of flour. Beat until you get a homogeneous dough.
Incorporate the remaining flour and beat until the mixture is smooth. Let the dough rest covered for 1 hour to double its size.
Knead the dough on a floured surface, roll out with a rolling pin and form the donuts.
Place the donuts on a greased baking tray and let them rest for 20 minutes. Preheat the oven to 200ºC.
Bake the donuts for 10 minutes or until they are golden. Spread with melted butter and pass through the sugar and cinnamon mixture. Serve hot or let cool.

pizza.name: Pepperoni Pizza
steps: Spread the pizza dough on a tray.
Cover the dough with tomato sauce.
Sprinkle the grated mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Place the pepperoni slices on the cheese.
Bake the pizza for 12-15 minutes, or until it is golden and bubbly.
Serve hot and enjoy your pepperoni pizza!
